name: Blocky Block-Blocks
description:
In Blocky Block-Blocks, the less blocks you use, the more time you get. Try and use as few blocks as possible to get the best time!

Leave a comment with your fastest time and thanks for playing!

This game was made as part of the Blackthornprod GAMEJAM #3. All of the art, music and programming where made during the week of the jam.
